patch:
diff --git a/.github/regression/micro.csv b/.github/regression/micro.csv
index 0c7ad9c66d56..a10f0a75233d 100644
--- a/.github/regression/micro.csv
+++ b/.github/regression/micro.csv
@@ -1,5 +1,3 @@
-Append100KIntegersINSERT
-Append100KIntegersPREPARED
 benchmark/micro/cast/cast_date_string.benchmark
 benchmark/micro/cast/cast_int_string.benchmark
 benchmark/micro/cast/cast_double_string.benchmark
diff --git a/benchmark/micro/list/string_split.benchmark b/benchmark/micro/list/string_split.benchmark
index b7c4b6d01360..89a7d0bbfee6 100644
--- a/benchmark/micro/list/string_split.benchmark
+++ b/benchmark/micro/list/string_split.benchmark
@@ -17,4 +17,4 @@ run
 SELECT SUM(LENGTH(str_split(l_comment, ' '))) FROM lineitem
 
 result I
-27124176
+27116609
diff --git a/benchmark/micro/list/string_split_regexp.benchmark b/benchmark/micro/list/string_split_regexp.benchmark
index 1504064a19ff..2cf5b1eb66df 100644
--- a/benchmark/micro/list/string_split_regexp.benchmark
+++ b/benchmark/micro/list/string_split_regexp.benchmark
@@ -17,4 +17,4 @@ run
 SELECT SUM(LENGTH(str_split_regex(l_comment, '[z ]'))) FROM lineitem
 
 result I
-27186473
+27179168
test_patch:

index 680ec052c067..fa84873b110c 100644
--- a/test/sql/function/list/list_concat.test
+++ b/test/sql/function/list/list_concat.test
@@ -144,7 +144,7 @@ SELECT list_append(NULL, 3)
 ----
 [3]
 
-query II
+query II rowsort
 SELECT i, list_append(list_concat(j, k), i) FROM lists
 ----
 0	[0, 4, 8, 12, 0, 4, 8, 12, 0]
problem_statement:
String split benchmark wrong result
### What happens?

In the latest commit, string split benchmark result is incorrect, including `benchmark/micro/list/string_split.benchmark`,  `benchmark/micro/list/string_split_regexp.benchmark`, `benchmark/micro/list/string_split_unicode.benchmark`

### To Reproduce

```
./benchmark/benchmark_runner benchmark/micro/list/string_split.benchmark
name    run     timing
benchmark/micro/list/string_split.benchmark     1       INCORRECT
INCORRECT RESULT: Error in result on row 1 column 1: expected value "27124176" but got value "27116609"
Obtained result:
sum(length(str_split(l_comment, ' ')))
HUGEINT
[ Rows: 1]
27116609
```

### OS:

ubuntu 20.04

### DuckDB Version:

v0.7.2-dev3561

### DuckDB Client:

binary

### Full Name:

Ke Xu

### Affiliation:

Southeast University

### Have you tried this on the latest `master` branch?

- [X] I agree

### Have you tried the steps to reproduce? Do they include all relevant data and configuration? Does the issue you report still appear there?

- [X] I agree
hints_text: Thanks for the report! This is most likely because the `l_comment` column contains slightly different data as per reducing the string buffer size in #6535. I think the benchmark file just needs to be updated with the new answer.
